what_you_do: Kimberly Jürgen is a Radical Curiosity Coach who empowers professional women who feel stifled to emerge as confident leaders, ready to speak up and shine in any business setting.
who_you_serve: Professional women who feel stifled and want to gain newfound confidence and thrive in all aspects of their life.
